SWFVideoStream->setDimension

(PHP 5.0.5-5.3.0, PECL ming CVS)

SWFVideoStream->setDimension — Sets video dimension

Description

SWFVideoStream
void setDimension ( int $x , int $y )

Sets the width and height for streamed videos.

Parameters

x

Width in pixels.

y

Height in pixels.

Return Values

No value is returned.
